Authors: Thomas Friedl, Eberhard Hegewald, Judit Padisák
Title:
Pseudotetraëdriella kamillae a new genus and species of
Eustigmatophyceae
Abstract:
A new genus Pseudotetraedriella E. Hegewald gen. nov. and
species Pseudotetraedriella kamillae E. Hegewald et J. Padisák spec.
nov. are described. The species differs markedly from the described
species with tetralobular shape (Tetraedron (Chlorophyta),
Tetraedriella(Xanthophyceae). 18S rDNA sequence analyses demonstrate its
close relationship with a morphologically rather different species,
Monodopsis subterranea, within the class Eustigmatophyceae
(Heterokontophyta). Ecological features of the newly described species
are also discussed.
